segments.text: I see the water gushing out, soaking the floor and running down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice it? It’s like the world is falling apart around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are playing a game of danger, and she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel my frustration rising as the puddle expands under her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Is nobody going to say anything about this mess?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like the chaos in this room is invisible to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she’d just take a moment to look around us.
segments.speaker: PAR
